sentences.english: The result showed that nanoscale silver has evidently inhibitory effects on testing bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，纳米银对供试菌种有较为明显的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Health experts are worried that a new, more virulent strain may be to blame.
sentences.chinese: 卫生专家担心这一现象归咎于一种毒力更强的新菌种。

sentences.english: The hypha achieves the request as the mother culture by observation.
sentences.chinese: 试验观察灵芝菌种达到作为母种使用的要求。

sentences.english: Thailand currently makes use of GM Escherichia coli as an inoculant in lysine production.
sentences.chinese: 泰国目前利用转基因大肠杆菌作为菌种来生产赖氨酸。

sentences.english: Recombinant gene technology is widely employed in research and development for strain improvement.
sentences.chinese: 重组基因技术被广泛应用于菌种改良的研究和开发。

sentences.english: NK produced by this strain was an extracellular enzyme.
sentences.chinese: 该菌种所产的NK是一种胞外酶。

sentences.english: Mucor flavus is one of the main moulds used in sufu production in the northeast area of China.
sentences.chinese: 黄色毛霉是东北地区生产腐乳用的菌种之一。

sentences.english: The predominant organism groups were mainly Aspergillus sydowii in the biofilter.
sentences.chinese: 生物过滤池优势菌种主要是聚多曲霉菌种。

sentences.english: The performance of lactic acid bacteria has important influence on the quality of fermented yoghourt.
sentences.chinese: 乳酸菌菌种的性能对发酵型酸奶的品质具有重要影响。

sentences.english: Cornstalk degradation is strengthened by microorganisms group than by single one.
sentences.chinese: 多菌种组合对玉米秸秆的转化性能优于单一菌种。

sentences.english: Cornstalk degradation is strengthened by microorganisms group than by single one.
sentences.chinese: 多菌种组合对玉米秸秆的转化性能优于单一菌种。

sentences.english: Topping my holiday wish list this year is an HD-720 from Spawn Labs.
sentences.chinese: 托我的节日愿望清单今年是高清从菌种实验室720。

sentences.english: The construction of new overproducing microbial strains will be facilitated by using genetic methods.
sentences.chinese: 采用遗传方法将促进建设新的高产微生物菌种。

sentences.english: Mositure and temperature were the key to ensure the quality of rhizopus Q303.
sentences.chinese: 水分和温度是保证根霉Q303菌种质量的关键。

sentences.english: The degradation charateristics of these refractory organics in use of immobilized dominant microorganism were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了包埋固定化优势菌种对相应有机物的降解特性。

sentences.english: A variety of taxa were observed in the culturable and total spore samples.
sentences.chinese: 于可培养及总孢子样本中，可观察到菌种之多样性。

definition: Bacillus subtilis (formerly Bacillus natto), a common soil bacterium
